00028 /* Includes ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00029 #include "ht32.h"
00030 #include "ht32_board.h"
00031 
00032 /** @addtogroup HT32_Series_Peripheral_Examples HT32 Peripheral Examples
00033   * @{
00034   */
00035 
00036 /** @addtogroup NVIC_Examples NVIC
00037   * @{
00038   */
00039 
00040 /** @addtogroup Vector_Table_Offset
00041   * @{
00042   */
00043 
00044 
00045 /* Settings ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00046 #define VECTOR_BASED_ADDRESS    (0x20000000)
00047 #define TOTAL_VECTOR            (64)
00048 #define SYSTICK_VECTOR_COUNT    (15)
00049 
00050 /* Private function prototypes -----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00051 void InitVector(void);
00052 void SysTick_HandlerExtra(void);
00053 
00054 /* Global variables ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00055 
00056 u32 *RAMVector = (u32 *)VECTOR_BASED_ADDRESS;
00057 
00058 /* Global functions ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00059 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00060   * @brief  Main program.
00061   * @retval None
00062   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00063 int main(void)
00064 {
00065   /* Initialize LEDs                                                                                        */
00066   HT32F_DVB_LEDInit(HT_LED1);
00067   HT32F_DVB_LEDInit(HT_LED2);
00068   HT32F_DVB_LEDInit(HT_LED3);
00069 
00070   InitVector();
00071 
00072   // Must be 64 word (256 Bytes) aligned, 0x00 (0), 0x100 (256), 0x200 (512)
00073   NVIC_SetVectorTable(NVIC_VECTTABLE_RAM, VECTOR_BASED_ADDRESS);
00074 
00075   /* Generate SysTick Interrupt                                                                             */
00076   SysTick_Config(0xFFFFFF);
00077 
00078   while (1);
00079 }
00080 
00081 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00082   * @brief  Init vector.
00083   * @retval None
00084   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00085 void InitVector(void)
00086 {
00087   s32 i = 0;
00088 
00089   for( i = TOTAL_VECTOR - 1; i >= 0; i--)
00090   {
00091     RAMVector[i] =  rw(i * 4);
00092   }
00093 
00094   RAMVector[SYSTICK_VECTOR_COUNT] = (u32)&SysTick_HandlerExtra;
00095 }
00096 
00097 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00098  * @brief   This function handles SysTick Handler.
00099  * @retval  None
00100  ************************************************************************************************************/
00101 void SysTick_HandlerExtra(void)
00102 {
00103   /* Toggle LEDs */
00104   HT32F_DVB_LEDToggle(HT_LED1);
00105   HT32F_DVB_LEDToggle(HT_LED2);
00106   HT32F_DVB_LEDToggle(HT_LED3);
00107 }
00108 
00109 #if (HT32_LIB_DEBUG == 1)
00110 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00111   * @brief  Report both the error name of the source file and the source line number.
00112   * @param  filename: pointer to the source file name.
00113   * @param  uline: error line source number.
00114   * @retval None
00115   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00116 void assert_error(u8* filename, u32 uline)
00117 {
00118   /*
00119      This function is called by IP library that the invalid parameters has been passed to the library API.
00120      Debug message can be added here.
00121      Example: printf("Parameter Error: file %s on line %d\r\n", filename, uline);
00122   */
00123 
00124   while (1)
00125   {
00126   }
00127 }
00128 #endif
